SEARCH
Package menu

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
menu.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Object
Main menu class that serves as the entry point for the BTO Management System. Handles login flow, registration, and navigates to appropriate user menus.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenu

      public MainMenu()
      Constructor for MainMenu. Initializes all required systems, handlers, and loads data from storage.

  • Method Details

    • displayMainMenu

      public void displayMainMenu()
      Displays the main menu and handles user interactions. This is the primary entry point for the application.

    • loginFlow

      private void loginFlow()
      Handles the login process for different user types. Directs users to appropriate menus based on their role.

    • handleUserSession

      private void handleUserSession(User user)
      Handles a user session with support for mode switching between Officer and Applicant modes. Officers can switch between officer functions and applicant functions.
      Parameters:
      user - The logged-in user

    • promptForMode

      private int promptForMode(String name)
      Prompts the officer to select a mode (Officer or Applicant).
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the officer
      Returns:
      The selected mode (1 for Officer, 2 for Applicant)

    • registerFlow

      private void registerFlow()
      Handles the applicant registration process. Adds newly registered users to the userList if registration is successful.

    • readChoice

      private int readChoice(String prompt, int min, int max)
      Helper method to read a numeric choice from the user with validation.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to display to the user
      min - The minimum acceptable value
      max - The maximum acceptable value
      Returns:
      The validated user choice
